      • calculateQKgTransported

        public void calculateQKgTransported()
        Name: calculateQKgTransported. calculates the total of Kg transported by the client by adding all the individual orders total weight. pre owners arraylistd must be previously defined. pre getTotalWeight() must be in between cero (not including cero) and 28000, getTotalWeight() > 0, getTotalWeight() <= 28000

        Parameters:
        qKgTransported - must be in between cero and MAX_VALUE, qKgTransported > 0, qKgTransported <= MAX_VALUE.

      • showOrder

        public java.lang.String showOrder(int order)
        Name: showOrder. gets the indivudal information of an order in the arraylist orders, and concatenates it in an string to organice the information.
        Parameters:
        order - must represent a valid index in the arrayList orders therefore it must be in between cero and orders arrayList size. order >= 0 && order < orders.size(). orders must be previously defined. orders must conatain al least one Load. orders.get(order) !=null.
        Returns:
        String.

      • getOrder

        Name: getorder. gets a single order out of the ArrayList of orders.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        order.

        public void addOrder(Load order)

      • removeOrder

        public void removeOrder(int order)
        Name: removeOrder. removes an objet Load from the orders arrayList.
        Parameters:
        order - must represent a valid index in the arrayList shipments therefore it must be in between cero and orders arrayList size. order >= 0 && order < orders.size(). pre the arraylist orders must be defined. and its size needs to be greater than 0. shipments.size() > 0.

      • getDiscount

        public double getDiscount()
        Name: getDiscount. gives the type(int) a double value that represents the discount percentage and returns the discount. pre the type be defined. and it needs to be between one and four, type > 0 && type <= 4.
        Returns:
        discount.
